Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioHandler
    This class is used to handle audio output and manage currently playing tracks.
    BackTile  
    Board
    The Board class is used for creating the Board that the game will be played on.
    Buffer
    The Buffer class is used for taking information from game components and formatting it into a display.
    BufferedKeyboard
    The BufferedKeyboard class uses an array when listening for key input to smoothen the transition between the keys that are pressed.
    BufferedMouse
    The BufferedMouse class takes and stores input from the mouse so that other classes can access and remove the information when needed.
    Card
    The Card class is used to construct cards that will be either operators or numbers in a Deck.
    CardGameNPC
    The CardGameNPC class is created so that NPCs can be added to the game which the player can play a Card game against.
    Chest
    The Chest class creates a Chest that the player can recieve new Cards from.
    Deck
    The Deck class is used to handle a set of cards that will be either operators or numbers.
    Door
    The Door class is an Obstacle that will take the player from one map to another.
    EndScreen
    This is the main menu that will initiate the game.
    Entity
    The Entity class stores all the information relative to any characters.
    EntityBuffer
    The EntityBuffer class is used for taking information from the Entity components of the game and formatting it into a display.
    GamePanel
    The GamePanel class is the driver class for the card game.
    HighScore
    The HighScore class stores the player'name, score and level.
    HighScoreList
    The HighScoreList class is used to access and add to the list of HighScores.
    HighScoresPrinter
    This class is used to print the highscores.
    InformationNPC
    The InformationNPC class is created so that NPCs can be added to the game which the player can talk to if they are lonely.
    Map
    This class holds an array of Tiles which serve as a map for the main game.
    MenuPanel
    This is the MenuPanel that includes all the menu options in the game.
    NPC
    This is an abstract class that defines the generic attributes and behaviours of all NPCs.
    Obstacle
    The Obstacle class is a subclass of the Tile class.
    OpenWorldPanel
    This class serves as a driver class for the visuals of the open world aspect of this game.
    Player
    The Player class stores all the information relative to the player.
    Screen
    The Screen class aids in the processing and drawing of the game.
    SetPiece  
    Sign
    The Sign class is used to create a Sign with specified text.
    SplashScreen
    The SplashScreen for the program.
    Sprite
    The Sprite class is load and hold values of images as BufferedImages.
    TerrarithmeticApp
    The TerrarithmeticApp class serves as a driver class for the game.
    Tile
    This is an abstract class that defines the basic attributes and behaviours of all Tiles.
    TileBuffer
    The TileBuffer class is used for taking information from the Tile components of the game and formatting it into a display.
